Sylph/Core/Common.h File Reference

This file is a shortcut to include many commonly used headers. More...

#include "Any.h"
#include "Array.h"
#include "Dictionary.h"
#include "Primitives.h"
#include "Range.h"
#include "String.h"
#include "Exception.h"

Include dependency graph for Common.h:

This graph shows which files directly or indirectly include this file:

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

This file is a shortcut to include many commonly used headers.

Actually, it will include the following headers (relative to Sylph/Core):

  • Any.h
  • Array.h
  • Dictionary.h
  • Primitives.h
  • Range.h
  • String.h
  • Exception.h
It also has 'using' statements for following classes:
  • Sylph::Array
  • Sylph::Dictionary
  • Sylph::String
  • Sylph::range
You can turn this of by defining the macro SYLPH_NO_COMMON_USING before inclusion.
